#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int func( long long n ) {
    if ( n == 1 )
        return 1;
    if ( n == 2 || n == 3 )
        return 2;
    return func( n/2 ) * 2;
}

int main ( ) {
    long long t,n;
    scanf ( "%lld" , &t );
    while ( t-- ) {
        scanf ( "%lld" , &n );
        printf ( "%d\n" , func(n));
    }
    return 0;
}
